price: Nígbà tí wọ́n tayọ ẹnu-ààlà níbi ohun tí A kọ̀ fún wọn, A sọ fún wọn pé: “Ẹ di ọ̀bọ, ẹni ìgbéjìnnà sí ìkẹ́.”
arabic: فَلَمَّا عَتَوۡاْ عَن مَّا نُهُواْ عَنۡهُ قُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُواْ قِرَدَةً خَٰسِـِٔينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā ʿataw ʿan mā nuhū ʿanhu qul'nā lahum kūnū qiradatan khāsiīna
